title: BC服进入后问题
author: Kastoo
txt_content:
第一次进入服务器时是在登录服  但是后面进去就在下线所在的子服了  大佬们求助！

ip_forward: true
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: bb738dc9-49f9-492f-88e2-042e3b665a44
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
servers:
  登入服:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18003
    restricted: false
  人間世:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18001
    restricted: false
  副本:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18002
    restricted: false
  点券商城:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18006
    restricted: false
  资源世界:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18004
    restricted: false
  抽奖大厅:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18008
    restricted: false
  地皮世界:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18005
    restricted: false
  全球市场:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:18007
    restricted: false
timeout: 30000
listeners:
- query_port: 32820
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - 登入服
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:32820
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
prevent_proxy_connections: false
player_limit: -1
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
connection_throttle: 4000
复制代码这个是BC端的config

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Kastoo 发表于 2019-7-29 15:42
有这个  可是它填了true以后自己变回false了
我说的是 default_server 不是 force_default_server

你要加一个 default_server: lobby

什么的， force_default_server 才有用

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content: 我记得是 force_default_server: false改为true

replies.author: Kastoo
replies.txt_content:
mine新时代xs 发表于 2019-7-29 15:33
我记得是 force_default_server: false改为true
我刚刚试了一下  还是不行xd

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Kastoo 发表于 2019-7-29 15:35
我刚刚试了一下  还是不行xd
还要设置默认服务器

 default_server

详见 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-450015-1-1.html

replies.author: Kastoo
replies.txt_content:
mine新时代xs 发表于 2019-7-29 15:33
我记得是 force_default_server: false改为true
我刚刚又看了一下  我填了true以后立马给我转回false了
大佬这个怎么破？

replies.author: Kastoo
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-29 15:38
还要设置默认服务器

 default_server
有这个  可是它填了true以后自己变回false了

replies.author: EbarGame
replies.txt_content:
Kastoo 发表于 2019-7-29 15:42
有这个  可是它填了true以后自己变回false了
关服设置试试？
